price: When he reached his prime, We gave him wisdom[10] and knowledge. This is how We reward those who do good.
arabic: وَلَمَّا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُۥٓ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ حُكۡمٗا وَعِلۡمٗاۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
